eu_initiatives:
IMPACT Diabetes: the Initiative to Mobilize Parliamentarians to Act to Prevent, Care and Treat diabetes 
World Diabetes Day celebrations  
Written Declaration calls on the European Commission and the European Council to prioritise diabetes as a major European public health concern and to develop an EU strategy for diabetes prevention, diagnosis, and control. Written declaration 0008/2016 on Diabetes which was adopted on 02/05/2016 by the European Parliament 
Food Safety and Health Vytenis Andriukaitis to discuss the evolution of diabetes policies in Europe and how to improve prevention, education and care, meeting with European Commissioner
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Celebración Día Mundial 
Publicación Revista Diabetes 
Notas de prensa 
Carrera/Marcha popular correr juntos por la Diabetes 
Redes sociales
goals__remit: Los fines de la Sociedad Española de Diabetes son, en primer lugar, agrupar a todos los profesionales interesados en los aspectos científicos, clínicos, educativos y médico-sociales que la Diabetes plantea; y en segundo lugar, asesorar a cuantas instituciones lo requieran sobre los aspectos relativos a la Diabetes, a nivel nacional e internacional.
